quests.desc: You are now playing a life changing round of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First, it would be a great idea if you could retrieve the shoe from the American style chest in the attic. Then, put the shoe on the rack inside the attic. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take shoe from American style chest
take shoe from American style chest

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You arrive in an attic. An ordinary one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You make out a American style chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The American style chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The American style chest is empty![end if] You make out a rack. The rack is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a scullery.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a pantry.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: American style chest
infos.desc: The American style chest looks strong, and impossible to crack open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: American style passkey
infos.desc: The American style passkey is cold to the touch

infos.name: shoe
infos.desc: The shoe seems to fit in here

infos.name: laptop
infos.desc: The laptop appears to be out of place here

infos.name: pair of pants
infos.desc: The pair of pants appears well matched to everything else here

infos.name: frisbee
infos.desc: The frisbee appears to be to fit in here

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, take the shoe from the American style chest within the attic. Then, rest the shoe on the rack in the attic. That's it!

main_quest.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, take the shoe from the American style chest within the attic. Then, rest the shoe on the rack in the attic. That's it!
commands: take shoe from American style chest
